p.k: The Échenard and Duperrex families, making the change
p.d: The Duperrex family looks for local and seasonal products and reduces its intake of animal proteins. Objective: to cook a low-emission meal for the annual family dinner. The Échenard family rethink their weekly routines to limit the distance covered by car. Another challenge: to limit food waste. Directed by: Yann-Olivier Wicht (Switzerland, 2018)
